Posts.Content: Hi everyone I m new to the group I was diagnosed with invasive breast cancer 13 the April told needed cat scan , results showed something on my lung and liver so had pat scan next this showed I have lung nodule oncologist explained that as its on the same side as the breast cancer they need to look at it more closely I have lung surgery tomorrow I wondered if anyone else has had similar ,also worried chemo has been held up thanksÂ
Posts.Title: Cant start chemo as i have to have lung opfirst
